name: Salamander in Progress
description:
Learn and grow as a salamander! Will you reach adulthood? 

This story-based 5-minute game is easy to play with only a mouse. If you choose the right path, you'll see yourself (a salamander) grow from an egg to a larva and beyond.

================

Made For
A Game by its Cover Jam 2019 (a late entry)
and Tyler's Birthday 2019 (surprisingly on time)

================

Credits
Code, Art, & Writing: Ruthie Edwards
Music: Mark Sparling
Original Concept: Tyler Rhodes
Fonts: Chevy Ray
